message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to work with you. We're willing to offer you a competitive price of $9000 for the product. We believe this is a great starting point, and we're open to negotiations.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $9000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $7500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, we're willing to meet you halfway. We're offering a new price of $8500 for the product. We believe this is a fair compromise, considering its value to us and to you.

Alice, thank you for your flexibility. While I appreciate the lower price, $8500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  Let's split the difference and I'll offer $8000 for the product.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can finalize the deal.

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After re-evaluating our pricing strategy, we're willing to make one more concession. We're offering a new price of $8200 for the product. We believe this is a fair compromise, considering its value to us and to you.
